Anime Ninja Animation Pack (for Male)

 This pack includes the following animations: 
 • Triple Spin

 • Slash!
 • Kip-up
 • Starfish Kip-up
 Why spend years training with monks in the mountains when you can enable this pack and show off your Ninja skills! [#Legal]
